website_summaries.verdict: By far the best product available. Provides excellent relief.
pros: Features a stay-put design from a trusted brand
Gets high marks for easing congestion, snoring, and deviated septums
cons: They can be irritating if removed quickly, but taking them off slowly corrects this issue

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. I rarely snore anymore and my husband gets more rest too! My only concern is that the adhesive is so strong (as it needs to be to stay on all night), when I remove the strip in the morning, it takes off a layer of skin from my nose. After 1 week of use, I had exposed skin and a sore on the top of my nose. To resolve the issue, but still be able to wear the strips, I simply apply a small amount of vaseline to the softest skin on my nose, and the strips have been working perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I literally bought this product yesterday and received it today tonight was the first night. My husband tried it. I thought to myself this is it I can finally get good quality sleep again. So disappointed feel free to play the video to see the results
customer_reviews.author: Khadija B.

customer_reviews.title: If you're new to Breathe Right
customer_reviews.text: The original version (the one I'm reviewing right now) is better than the extra strength, and I'll tell you why. The extra strength, while obviously made of a stronger level of spring in the strip, is also skinnier. As such, it pulls a smaller portion of the nasal passage up. I've used these for years almost every night, and I recommend the original. The chamomile is kind of fun for the smell, but don't buy it if it's too much extra money.
customer_reviews.author: LovePrime

customer_reviews.title: The good news: Apparently I don't snore at night when ...
customer_reviews.text: The good news: Apparently I don't snore at night when wearing these. The bad news: The wife won't have the lovin's with me when wearing them. Note to self: apply strips after lovin's, sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: E. L. Robichaud

customer_reviews.title: Breathe again
customer_reviews.text: I am supposed to be using a c-pap all night long. Never could get used to the C pap so I use these instead. I don't see what the difference is because it lifts my nose up so that I can breathe properly and I get much better air flow. I wear these around the house and I don't care who sees me because it least I can breathe. During the Winter I wear them all night long. When you take them off just put a little bit of face cream on your nose to get the adhesive off.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Castrinos

customer_reviews.title: I forgot what sleep was like until I was able to breathe
customer_reviews.text: Makes me go from Darth Vader back to normal. Just be careful if you have allergies to take an anti-itch med because the nose tickles don't go away, they just get magnified since your nostrils are wide open. I'd give it five stars but it sticks a little TOO well and the residue/marks hang out a little longer in the morning than hoped for, so your coworkers will know you slap a sticker on your honker just to stop snoring (or just be able to breathe)
customer_reviews.author: Taylor L.

customer_reviews.title: Truly works
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a deviated septum so he keeps me awake at night with his nose horns. I bought this in an effort to alleviate my one insomniac symptom and....it works! Within five seconds, he could breathe easier and his intake was smoother. Me? Yeah I sleep better now (: Only issue I had was with the packaging as it arrived smashed and taped like it was used only to find the seal still intact on both lids so I am overall happy! #realreview
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like is sometimes it really sticks to my skin and ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it as he informed me that I snore. I didn't believe him. I wear this occasionally and when I'm not wearing it my husband confirms that I snore. So I guess it works. The only thing I don't like is sometimes it really sticks to my skin and when I remove it, I pulls a little more than I would like as it doesn't help my anti-wrinkle/aging mission. Oh well, I guess I have to take one for the team so that everyone gets better sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Arnau

customer_reviews.title: The Extra strong version of this product is 5 STAR ...
customer_reviews.text: The Extra strong version of this product is 5 STAR the original is just ok. The original do not lift the nasal passages open as well as the extra strong ones do.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Great, but ouch!
customer_reviews.text: I love these but absolutely need to switch to the sensitive skin version. Even washing my face with hot water and using a cotton swab dabbed in alcohol, these suckers won’t come off my face without taking skin with them. I used them for a week straight, LOVED that I could sleep while breathing thru my nose, but now I need to stop for a few days to let my skin rest. Hopefully the sensitive skin version means they’re a little more gentle in removing.
customer_reviews.author: pamela rose

customer_reviews.title: I got on subscription order and always have them on hand!
customer_reviews.text: Love them every night! So much better than taking medication to open sinuses. I usually use after a netti-pot session and it keeps me clear though the night. My doctor likes that I use it with my Bi-Pap (C-Pap) machine instead of taking additional meds.
customer_reviews.author: TWH

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I am 4 months pregnant and my sinuses are killing me! I haven’t been able to sleep because I can’t breath out of my nose when I’m laying down. This has made a HUGE difference. I can finally breath perfectly out of my nose at night and I’m finally getting some sleep! I felt it working it’s magic right away. I also have very sensitive skin and I’ve had no issues. Just be sure to read the directions for safe removal. No way that thing was coming off during the night either. I even blew my nose a few times and it didn’t budge. In love with these things!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Early

customer_reviews.title: Half of the strips will not hold
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for over a decade and never had the problem of the strips not holding. This time, over 75% of the product fell off in about 30 minutes. I know exactly how to place them, on a clean dry nose, no creams or lotions--I have done it for years., no problems. But with this order it seems like a new adhesive is being used--cheaper???-- and I have had to pay for the experiment. What gives???? Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Don't Expect Complete Silence...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend after almost two years of dealing with him snoring loudly every night. Although I can tell he is breathing more easily and the snoring isn't as loud as before, I still lay awake at night. I would recommend trying something else before buying these as they may just be a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Huge difference
customer_reviews.text: After getting a septoplasty I was hoping my congestion was behind me but unfortunately my sleep didn't improve. These work wonders, stay on all night, and are easy to take off in the morning. Make sure to use warm water!
customer_reviews.author: Samy

customer_reviews.title: Good adhesion and definitely does the job
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive is a little tricky but once you get the hang of it, it really sticks. And I mean it really sticks, because sometimes in the morning it can be hard to take off. It also caused a small pimple to form around my nose, but it really wasn't that big of a deal. However, I do have to say that if it were not this sticky, the product would likely not work, and the product works very well for what it's intended. I used it mainly because I've started taping my mouth at night to stop mouth breathing but I get so congested that I can't breathe through my nose. This definitely solves that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sindy A.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - better sleep every night.
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have! I have sinus congestion and use these every night. Since they're a bit expensive, I tried other brands like from Amazon, CVS, Walgreens - nope! they fall off in a couple hours, the hold is not strong at all. This one will get you through the night, no issue. The cheaper ones are a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: TZ_Here

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Looks simple enough but it is not put on take off. It does open the air way but be careful when removing. If you just pull it off you may leave your nose red and tender in places. I highly recommend following the removal instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barely works
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my spouse and they worked kind of. They quieted the snoring but there was still very loud snoring and in the middle of the night the strip would just come right off. I can handle the snoring now with the strip on them but I wish it got rid of the snoring all together.
customer_reviews.author: Liz/ElliotTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for the hubby :/
customer_reviews.text: I’m sad to say these did not work for my husband!! We gave them a try 3 different tries now, I thought maybe the first time we didn’t place it in the correct spot so we gave it another go but... he was still snoring the night away. I had high hopes after reading the other reviews. I’m on a mission to find some that work!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: I’m still awake....
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t even make a dent in my husband’s snoring. I wouldn’t waste my money on this If I’d been able to have him try them out before buying. They are completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: chad-roscoe

customer_reviews.title: Sticks super well, not extremely effective
customer_reviews.text: Bought these cuz i snore a lot and my girl friend needed to sleep better hah. these stick super well on your nose but they definetly will irritate the skin when you feel them off. apparently they work most of the time according to my girlfriend so thats a plus. she said maybe about 70% of nights it stops the snoring
customer_reviews.author: Jinlian Yang

customer_reviews.title: I have used these for years - they are great
customer_reviews.text: The right side of my nose has a tendency to collapse inwards due to some serious head trauma from years ago making it harder to breathe. Without these strips my sleep is frequently disrupted. When I use them sleep is great. I have tried many brands over the years and these are the only ones that work for me. I have read that many people find that similar strips do not stay in place for long. This brand does as long as you clean the skin of the nose before applying them. I have to be peel them off in the morning,
customer_reviews.author: Maverell

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Breathe Right's for about a week and I actually sleep through the night. I normally get up multiple times, through the night, for potty breaks. No more! I get a solid 7 hours sleep before I have to get up. That hasn't happened in YEARS! THANK YOU!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Andi

customer_reviews.title: Life savers
customer_reviews.text: These nasal strips did a fantastic job at opening up my nose at night for the last 3 years. The adhesive is surprisingly good and the overall quality of these strips are great. I found plastic alternatives to this strip to be less useful due to the adhesive being sweated of at night. Fun fact: when you open a strip in the dark, there is a blue light that is emitted from the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: steve nguyen

customer_reviews.title: NO RETURN POLICY
customer_reviews.text: This crap doesn't work. Doesn't help you breathe better or relive snoring. NO RETURN POLICY. So don't waste your money. You can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: kay kay

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product for those who snore!
customer_reviews.text: Thank God for this product! Without having a CPAP or something similar, Breathe Right Strips really do help with my husband's snoring and allow him.to get a better night's sleep. Without doing a full blown sleep study,I highly recommend trying Breathe Right Strips!
customer_reviews.author: Wicked Photo Girl

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping that this would help my husbands snoring and me finally get to sleep! It did not. I have read reviews were it helped others so Iam not sure why it works on some and didn’t help him. But Iam out $11.28 and still can’t sleep cause of his snoring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So necessary!
customer_reviews.text: I don't snore, but I have some sinus problems that makes it hard to breathe when I lay down. I use a nasal strip every night and it really helps. If I forget to put one on, I always wake up because I can't breathe through my nose. I can't sleep without these. I get them on the subscribe and save, but unfortunately I can't get them this month because they are out of stock. To the local store I go!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Effective!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best nasal strips I have tried so far. They are not cheap but using them makes the difference between being able to sleep all night long and struggling to breathe without getting the rest I need. I've tried the wider version from the same brand but I feel it's way too much; the glue sticks to your nose so much that when you go to remove the strip it pulls your skin. The original ones are a bit longer and not as wide and sticky enough to last all night long. I just make sure I wipe my nose real good before applying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s not the best for snoring
customer_reviews.text: Stopped about 30% of my fiancé’s snoring. It’s just okay. Sticks well though, doesn’t come off during his sleep. Also not uncomfortable for him.
customer_reviews.author: Mami

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend’s nose is not even that big and we had to attach two together to fit. They did not adhere very well and they did not keep him from snoring.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie D

customer_reviews.title: Got worse, can't use them enymore.
customer_reviews.text: You guys changed the design which made it to a point that I can't use them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: these keep my nose open nicely while I sleep
customer_reviews.text: They keep me from getting brain damage. I do not breathe well through my nose, and will not use a c pap machine, these keep my nose open nicely while I sleep. I use them every night.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stop snore,. But it reduces the loudness
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t completely stop snoring but it definitely help reduce the loudness . Scale 1-10 went from 10 to 3 . Can still here light snore but not that bad/loud as it was . If you sleep next to someone who snore loud .. will help, no more speaker phone in my ear
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my wife happy
customer_reviews.text: I snore at night because I cannot breathe through my nose. This product helps keep my nasal passage open and clear enough so I can breathe through my nose and don't snore which wakes up my wife. It is important to wash any oils from your nose so the adhesive will stick for a longer time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. Bought it for my father who is visiting. He usually snores really loud that I hear him across multiple rooms. After using it for a week, I could barely hear him snoring at all. Very satisfied with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Trusted Advisor

customer_reviews.title: Good,  but too strong adhesive for me
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side, they work. They improve breathing, and reduce snoring. In the not so plus side, I had to stop using them because they were ripping the skin off of my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Curt S. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Triboluminescence
customer_reviews.text: The paper wrapper(looks like bandaid wrapper) glows in the dark and it’s really cool. Tried to show it to my bf but he made me sound like I’ve gone nuts so I googled about it. It’s pretty cool stuff: Triboluminescence is an optical phenomenon in which light is generated when a material is mechanically pulled apart, ripped, scratched, crushed, or rubbed (see tribology). The phenomenon is not fully understood, but appears to be caused by the separation and reunification of static electrical charges.
customer_reviews.author: Kento Nagatani

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised 😯 not in a good way. The nasal strip did not stick to my skin no matter how I pressed.
customer_reviews.author: Wonderful product.

customer_reviews.title: Great for blocked nose
customer_reviews.text: Got this for those nights where I feel like my nose is blocked, even tho I have no runny nose. It works great I don’t feel like I’ll have a mini anxiety from not being able to get enough oxygen. And sticks pretty good when you take it out in the morning it leaves a weird glue feeling from the adhesive, but it just means it’s working great
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Silva

customer_reviews.title: They work, but not in the way I had needed.
customer_reviews.text: I like these, but they don't really help me with what I was hoping for. One of my nasal cavities is smaller than the other so sleeping on one side means I can't breath through my nose too well. These helped a little but not enough. They did make it noticeably easier to breath through my nose however, so they do work.
customer_reviews.author: ATRhys

customer_reviews.title: Great Sleep Aid
customer_reviews.text: No need to be discomforted and stick a nozel in your nose. This is truly the one of the best solutions for sleep apnea.
customer_reviews.author: Fadi

customer_reviews.title: A good night's sleep with strips
customer_reviews.text: The regular strip are the only one's I'll buy. The extra strength are way to hurtful when you remove them. My brother wouldn't be able to sleep without these strips.
customer_reviews.author: Trader Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down
customer_reviews.text: I will not be buying this brand again. For me, they don't work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jatin

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. But I like the clear one better.
customer_reviews.author: The lonely

customer_reviews.title: My husband had to make sure I wasn’t dead.
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the directions, these work great! Important for the adhesive that your skin isn’t oily. I’ve been married for almost 2 years, and my husband says last night was the first time I haven’t snored. He actually checked up a couple of times to make sure I wasn’t dead. Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Glue is way too sticky
customer_reviews.text: The glue on the sticky side is very uncomfortable. It left behind stick residue when I took it off. Breathing with this on also left my throat very dry.
customer_reviews.author: Abnel

customer_reviews.title: These work OK.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the breathe right strips I bought in the past worked better. Also a generic warehouse store brand seem stronger. Maybe it’s me or I got a bad batch this time
customer_reviews.author: Bob M.

customer_reviews.title: Weak pull, weak adhesion
customer_reviews.text: Lost shape REAL quickly and doesn't regain it. Also stopped sticking REAL quickly. I tried to like this product but had to re apply it constantly while trying to sleep not only wastes money but also sleep time.
customer_reviews.author: Cromonas

customer_reviews.title: life or death
customer_reviews.text: I broke my nose. These things really help me breath at night. I'm completely dependent of them. Wish they were a little more gentle on my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Will buy more. Not meant for sensitive skin, check out the clear ones if you need a sensitive skin product. Works as described, I use for congestion.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well, but could irritate your skin a little bit
customer_reviews.text: Works well and does what it's supposed to do --- keeping one's nostrils open. I do sleep better with them and don't wake up in the morning with such a dry mouth as I did before. But if you use it every night, within days you may start having skin problems on your nose like I did. Whatever they use to the hold the piece in place on your nose is pretty strong. So peeling it off in the morning is a somewhat delicate process.
customer_reviews.author: B.E.

customer_reviews.title: These Work!
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses these all the time. She now wakes up rested and no morning headache.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Caywood

customer_reviews.title: They work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: They do what they say, they hold your nose open. They aren't perfect for snoring but they're better than not.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. People

customer_reviews.title: Did not relieve Snoring
customer_reviews.text: They stay on just fine, but don't stop the snoring. May irritate tender skin when removing as they stick like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Reduces Snoring
customer_reviews.text: Seem to reduce snoring which makes my wife happy. Comfortable once applied. A bit of a pull when removing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best product for sleeping through a stuffy nose!
customer_reviews.text: It worked really well for me when I was a bit stuffy and had to sleep in my back after surgery. I was surprised at the strength of the adhesive when I took it off the next morning.
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Beminemo

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: these work good. they do help me fall asleep quicker. they stick on good. taking them off in the morning is fine. just have the water run over ur nose as you take it off. it is a bit big for me but she gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ida

customer_reviews.title: they can work, but it's takes a lot of effort to get it right
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a very large, and broken nose. We really have had a hard time with placement success. when he gets it in the right spot it does really reduce his snoring to the point I can sleep through most of it. The stickiness is reliable if a little too strong, he doesn't shower in the morning so it's a bit annoying to have to soak it off. I think a more thorough description of placement with trouble shooting would help before you go through a whole box to get them to work right.
customer_reviews.author: heatherette

customer_reviews.title: quiet sleep
customer_reviews.text: These were for my husband who is a snorer . Work well. I finally can stop poking him all night and I get to sleep!
customer_reviews.author: genie

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t make any difference! Not satisfied at all. Didn’t help with snoring and not comfortable while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: mirna farah

customer_reviews.title: We fixed the snoring!
customer_reviews.text: They work great, but I might take the sensitive ones next to see if they are as sticky in the morning, feels like I’m ripping my dang nose off, but oddly doesn’t leave a red mark Lol
customer_reviews.author: Cheesecake Malone

customer_reviews.title: Breathing better, sleeping better
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit dubious about these but you feel the improvement to your breathing the moment you put them on. It does not completely stop me snoring but reduces it a lot (according to my wife) and I definitely sleep better with one on I worried about getting the strips off (after reading reviews) but found it pretty easy, just peel slowly from one end, they stick well but do not apply directly after face moisturiser, leave it an hour or so or the strips do not stick properly
customer_reviews.author: BubbleCat

customer_reviews.title: My wife snores like an angry rino
customer_reviews.text: My wife snores like an angry rino. I couldn’t sleep in the same house as her. Now she is bearable if I wear earplugs.
customer_reviews.author: NewMidwesterner

customer_reviews.title: These work great and help you sleep better!
customer_reviews.text: You have to wash your face first and give it time to dry before putting one of these on your nose. If you nose is oily then these will not stay on as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Sleep well with these
customer_reviews.text: These really work well. I can breathe so much better wearing these nose strips. Generic brands don't really cut it
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a good night's sleep when troubled by allergies
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a good night's sleep when troubled by allergies. I consider I have a smaller than average size nose, but the large size works much better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Yapper

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper getting them here instead of stores good product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these for a good while and like them saving money ordering them here
customer_reviews.author: william h.

customer_reviews.title: Just Breathe
customer_reviews.text: Product works well and as intended. Makes an amazing difference and helps reduce my snoring. My only suggestion is read the instructions, especially in regards to removal of the strips.
customer_reviews.author: Ray G.Top Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: No medication and bye bye to straining to pull air through my nose over these dry winter months.
customer_reviews.text: Breathing is great - living in a cold and low humidity climate after growing up down south I began to really struggle to breath with dry nasal passages that with irritation, required sudafed on a daily basis to open up my passageways. If you can afford the price to not medicate - These strips make the difference between an evening of shallow breathing and one of deep, clear in and out passageways. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sebring

customer_reviews.title: Only this brand will do
customer_reviews.text: I use a Bi-Pap (like a C-Pap, but with additional functions) when I sleep. Due to a severely crooked septum, my left nostril tends to close up when I am wearing my mask. I use a Breathe Right strip with the mask and no more nostril closing. I've tried other brands of this kind of product, but have found they cause a sore on my nose. In my experience, only the Breathe Right strips are gentle enough to use with my mask. (Bi-Pap and C-Pap machines use the same masks.)
customer_reviews.author: Dom Devereaux

customer_reviews.title: Great adhesion. Sleep is great now.
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. I need to remember to buy the clear ones though.
customer_reviews.author: Tom L.

customer_reviews.title: I have been using it probably for over 20 years.
customer_reviews.text: I try to use every night since I have a deviated septum. Works great when you have a stuffy nose. I even use it during the day. It helps dry up the mucus and speed up the length of your cold
customer_reviews.author: Ruben G. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: Did not see difference however I was sleeping so guess it works!
customer_reviews.author: A Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Kroger brand works better
customer_reviews.text: These are not strong enough. I've been buying a generic Kroger brand and those work much better as opening up my nasal passages.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Windstar

customer_reviews.title: CAREFUL YOU RECEIVE THE RIGHT SIZE!
customer_reviews.text: These work great, AS LONG AS AMAZON SHIPS THE RIGHT SIZE!!! I have consistenty received the WRONG SIZE (Small/medium instead of Large), via subscribe and save. Come on Amazon, get it right!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this product! It came fast and works great, my bf is a serious snorer and while I notice he still snores a little sometimes it’s about a million times better
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: They seem to work OK, but were very hard to remove in the morning. I must have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Only brand my husband will now use to help him ...
customer_reviews.text: Only brand my husband will now use to help him. He has a deviated septum and we don't have the money to get surgery right now, so he wears these, no joke, 27/7. I'm looking for ways to get coupons for these things, as we buy them so often.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Hard to remove by effective.
customer_reviews.text: Its like my nose has opened up. I get very restful sleep now. It's is hard to remove and not gentle on sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: B S.

customer_reviews.title: I can breathe!  I love it but...
customer_reviews.text: These made such a tremendous difference to my nose breathing. The promo says it might increase it 40% but it seemed to double my airflow. I'm sleeping much better and breathing through my nose. Once on they do not itch or bother me while I sleep. Although I give it five stars I will have to switch to the ones for sensitive skin because it sometimes takes skin. For a recent wedding I had an unsightly red sore on my nose.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kelly

customer_reviews.title: stop snoring
customer_reviews.text: I think it works. I will let you know when I go on vacation with my friend. My husband says it works but I don't think that he hears me snore 99% of the time(thank God)
customer_reviews.author: minigay

customer_reviews.title: Wont refund if they don’t stick to your skin
customer_reviews.text: Tried to return because they wouldn’t stick & I was denied. I do not have oily skin
customer_reviews.author: Ellen nutcher

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes doesn’t stick to my nose properly. Might be user error
customer_reviews.author: Breann McWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing - allergies
customer_reviews.text: Wow I love these. Great for breathing thru allergy season wow.
customer_reviews.author: Alynaa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit. Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Work perfectly. Don’t buy an other off brand!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Batey

customer_reviews.title: this really helps me sleep through the night
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy strips that stick properly, opens my nasal passages to I can sleep through the night-they are the best in use
customer_reviews.author: christine carlton

customer_reviews.title: A friend recommended for snoring and they help!
customer_reviews.text: Work well, opens passages, doesnt hurt my sensitive nose, yet sticks well. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Franchesca61

customer_reviews.title: Helps a little
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me I ended up needing a sleep study
customer_reviews.author: Justin williams

customer_reviews.title: sticks a lot better and longer than Extra or Advanced
customer_reviews.text: It had been a few years since I tried strips. I don't remember Extra or Advanced being available back then. So figuring newer is better I tried Advanced first, always on squeaky clean skin. They stuck for about an hour and a half. OK, so I downgraded to Extra and only got about a 3 hour stick. Finally I went to these originals and they're still sticking strong after 7 hours. It seems the newer models' aero wings don't contact my skin enough. The adhesive may be different too.
customer_reviews.author: R. P. Henerey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised that my husband doesn’t snore like before. Recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Glory

customer_reviews.title: Took skin off with this strip when I removed it.
customer_reviews.text: Well I have used these in the past and not had an issue, but this time when I removed the strip from my nose it took a big piece of my skin with it. Wish I could return it but return window is closed. "(
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: so these are perfect! I wear them every night and can finally ...
customer_reviews.text: I am pregnant and have a constant congestion due to the pregnancy, so these are perfect! I wear them every night and can finally breathe and sleep through the night! Love that it's a med-free solution!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can breathe sooo much better. GF still reports that I snore
customer_reviews.text: These things really help with opening up my nasal passage. Can breathe sooo much better. GF still reports that I snore :)
customer_reviews.author: ThinkGeek

customer_reviews.title: Nose skin or oxygen, you decide
customer_reviews.text: These technically work, in that I breathe easier. Unfortunately it is at the cost of a thin strip of my own skin removed every morning along with the strip. The adhesive is way too strong. I never remove without a warm wash cloth to soften the glue — I still lose skin. For last resort only.
customer_reviews.author: Confetti

customer_reviews.title: a breath of fresh air
customer_reviews.text: For years I have had "a stuffy nose" at night. If I wanted a good nights sleep I wouldhave to take a decongestant. I tried to do that as seldom as I could. Then came bareathe right. I was amazed. I can breath. I can sleep. I really wish I could wear them all day too. At first I thought they were not on good but, just leave it it will not come off as long as you don't have your night cream on your nose. Love Love Love it.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: They work great for breathing at night
customer_reviews.text: They work great for breathing at night, but leave a sticky residue on the nose after taking it off. I have to exfoliate the skin to take the sticky residue off.
customer_reviews.author: Jane1982

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy the extra strength
customer_reviews.text: These work and do the job, but the real value is in the extra strength breeze right strips I would buy those
customer_reviews.author: Doug MacKey

customer_reviews.title: breathe right, breathe better
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about a product being able to help me "breathe right" but purchased it anyway because I haven't been able to sleep well lately with my deviated septum and allergies (deathly combo). The first night I tried them, it felt weird but it did seem to enhance my breathing ability and I was able to get a decent nights sleep. I've been using it for a few weeks now and I think I've been sleeping better.
customer_reviews.author: AC

product_meta.title: Breathe Right Nasal Strips to Stop Snoring, Drug-Free, Original Tan Large
product_meta.description: Breathe Right Original Tan nasal strips are breathing aids for your nightly routine. They lift and open your nasal passages to help you breathe better so you can sleep better. Use them to reduce nasal congestion due to cold, allergies, or a deviated septum and help reduce or even stop snoring due to nasal congestion altogether. Breathe Right nasal strips are the only nasal strips that use 3M technology for comfortable fit and removal. Made with flexible, spring-like bands, they open your nose up to 38 percent more vs. decongestant sprays alone.
feature_bullets: Breathe Right nasal strips open your nose up to 38% more than allergy decongestant sprays alone and can help you reduce nasal snoring
Breathe Right nose strips are a drug free snoring aid that provides instant relief for nighttime nasal congestion due to cold or allergies
USE: Wash and dry your nose then apply above the nostrils.
REMOVE: Wash your face with warm water and start to loosen the nose strip from each end, gently lifting the strip off your nose
Breathe Right nasal strips are available in other colors, sizes and scents to help you breathe better so you can sleep better
